title: pkgcache internals
text: Windows special, repository used multiple architectures. Probably people us 64 bit R Windows, ’s RStudio starts default. also need make sure people need 32 bit R way install packages, without ruining 64 bit installation. Luckily, packages CRAN Bioconductor currently 32 bit . (64 bit .) addition, 32 bit R currently installs package architectures, installing source. (64 bit R-devel currently, might change.) light , : - default platform x86_64-w64-mingw32 64 bit R R 4.2. i386+x86_64-mingw32 64 bit R R 4.2. - default platform i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32 32 bit R. - windows platform name alias i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32. - compiling package source, ’ll observe requested platform name: - x86_64-w64-mingw32 64 bit R, compile 64 bit . - i386-w64-mingw32 64 bit R, compile 32 bit 64 bit. (probably way avoid using current arch.) - i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32 64 bit R, compile 32 bit 64. - i386-w64-mingw32 32 bit R, compile 32 bit 64 bit. avoid mistakenly messing 64 bit library. - x86_64-w64-mingw32 32 bit R, compile 32 bit 64 bit. (probably way avoid using current arch.) - i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32 32 bit R, compile 32 bit 64. summary, compiling packages, compile archs, unless platform x86_64-w64-mingw32 64 bit R session.

title: Cache CRAN-Like Metadata and R Packages
text: Package management tools may use pkg_cache_* functions particular package_cache class, make use local caching package files. pkg_cache_* API high level, uses user level cache: pkg_cache_add_file() can used add file, pkg_cache_delete_files() remove files, pkg_cache_get_files() copy files cache. package_cache class provides finer API.

title: Cache CRAN-Like Metadata and R Packages
text: metadata cache package cache support Bioconductor default, automatically. See BioC_mirror option R_BIOC_MIRROR R_BIOC_VERSION environment variables configure Bioconductor support.

title: Cache CRAN-Like Metadata and R Packages
text: BioC_mirror option can used select Bioconductor mirror. takes priority R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable. pkgcache_timeout HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_low_speed_limit pkgcache_low_speed_time used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less pkgcache_low_speed_limit bytes per second least pkgcache_low_speed_time seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options.

title: Cache CRAN-Like Metadata and R Packages
text: R_BIOC_VERSION environment variable can used override default Bioconductor version detection force given version. E.g. can used force development version Bioconductor. R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable can used select Bioconductor mirror. BioC_mirror option takes priority , set. PKGCACHE_TIMEOUT HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_timeout option priority , set. PKGCACHE_CONNECTTIMEOUT HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout option takes precedence , set. PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT bytes per second least PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options. pkgcache_low_speed_time pkgcache_low_speed_limit options priority environment variables, set. R_PKG_CACHE_DIR used cache directory, set. (Otherwise rappdirs::user_cache_dir() used, see also meta_cache_summary() pkg_cache_summary()).

title: Query Bioconductor version information — bioc_version
text: bioc_version() returns package_version object. bioc_version_map() returns data frame columns: bioc_version: package_version object, Bioconductor versions. r_version: package_version object, matching R versions. bioc_status: factor, levels: --date, release, devel, future. bioc_devel_version() returns package_version object. bioc_release_version() returns package_version object. bioc_repos() returns named character vector.

title: Query Bioconductor version information — bioc_version
text: bioc_version() queries matching Bioconductor version R version, defaulting current R version bioc_version_map() returns current mapping R versions Bioconductor versions. bioc_devel_version() returns version number current Bioconductor devel version. bioc_release_version() returns version number current Bioconductor release. bioc_repos() returns Bioconductor repository URLs. See BioC_mirror option R_BIOC_MIRROR R_BIOC_VERSION environment variables pkgcache manual page. can used customize desired Bioconductor version.

what: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
text: R6 class implements cache older CRAN package versions. higher level interface see functions documented cran_archive_list().

title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
text: cache similar cranlike_metadata_cache following layers: data inside cran_archive_cache object. Cached data current R session. RDS file current session's temporary directory. RDS file user's cache directory. synchronous asynchronous API.

title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
code: cac <- cran_archive_cache$new(   primary_path = NULL,   replica_path = tempfile(),   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror(),   update_after = as.difftime(7, units = "days"), )  cac$list(packages = NULL, update_after = NULL) cac$async_list(packages = NULL, update_after = NULL)  cac$update() cac$async_update()  cac$check_update() cac$async_check_update()  cac$summary()  cac$cleanup(force = FALSE)

title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
text: primary_path: Path primary, user level cache. Defaults user level cache directory machine. replica_path: Path replica. Defaults temporary directory within session temporary directory. cran_mirror: CRAN mirror use, takes precedence repos. update_after: difftime object. Automatically update cache gets older . Set Inf avoid updates. Defaults seven days. packages: Packages query, character vector. force: Whether force cleanup without asking user.

title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
text: Create new archive cache cran_archive_cache$new(). Multiple caches independent, e.g. update one , existing caches affected. cac$list() lists versions specified packages, packages, none specified. cac$async_list() , asynchronous. cac$update() updates cache. always downloads new metadata. cac$async_update() , asynchronous. cac$check_update() updates cache newer version available. cac$async_check_update() , asynchronous. cac$summary() returns summary archive cache, list entries: cachepath: path directory main archive cache, current_rds: RDS file stores cache. (file might exist, cache downloaded yet.) lockfile: file used locking cache. `timestamp: time stamp last update cache. size: size cache file bytes. cac$cleanup() cleans cache files.

title: Cache for CRAN archive data — cran_archive_cache
text: cac$list() returns data frame columns: package: package name, version: package version. character vector, package_version() object. older package versions supported package_version(). raw: raw row names CRAN metadata. mtime: mtime column CRAN metadata. usually pretty close release date time package. url: package download URL. mirror: CRAN mirror used get data.

what: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
title: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
text: CRAN mirrors store older versions packages /src/contrib/Archive, also store metadata /src/contrib/Meta/archive.rds. pkgcache can download cache metadata.

title: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
code: cran_archive_list(   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror(),   update_after = as.difftime(7, units = "days"),   packages = NULL )  cran_archive_update(cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror())  cran_archive_cleanup(cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror(), force = FALSE)  cran_archive_summary(cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror())

title: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
text: cran_mirror CRAN mirror use, see default_cran_mirror(). update_after difftime object. Automatically update cache gets older . Set Inf avoid updates. Defaults seven days. packages Character vector. report packages. force Force cleanup non-interactive mode.

title: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
text: cran_archive_list() returns data frame columns: package: package name, version: package version. character vector, package_version() object. older package versions supported package_version(). raw: raw row names CRAN metadata. mtime: mtime column CRAN metadata. usually pretty close release date time package. url: package download URL. mirror: CRAN mirror used get data. output ordered according package names (case insensitive) release dates. cran_archive_update() returns archive data data frame, format cran_archive_list(), invisibly. cran_archive_cleanup() returns nothing. cran_archive_summary() returns named list elements: cachepath: Path directory contains archive cache. current_rds: Path RDS file contains data specified cran_mirror. lockfile: Path lock file current_rds. timestamp: Path time stamp current_rds. NA cache empty. size: Size current_rds. Zero cache empty.

title: Data about older versions of CRAN packages — cran_archive_list
text: cran_archive_list() lists versions () packages. updates cached data first, older specified limit. cran_archive_update() updates archive cache. cran_archive_cleanup() cleans archive cache cran_mirror. cran_archive_summary() prints summary archive cache.

what: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: R6 class implements metadata cache CRAN-like repository. higher level interface, see meta_cache_list(), meta_cache_deps(), meta_cache_revdeps() meta_cache_update() functions.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: cache several layers: data stored inside cranlike_metadata_cache object. also stored RDS file, session temporary directory. ensures data used queries cranlike_metadata_cache object. stored RDS file user's cache directory. downloaded raw PACKAGES* files cached, together HTTP ETags, minimize downloads. synchronous asynchronous API.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
code: cmc <- cranlike_metadata_cache$new(   primary_path = NULL, replica_path = tempfile(),   platforms = default_platforms(), r_version = getRversion(),   bioc = TRUE, cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror(),   repos = getOption("repos"),   update_after = as.difftime(7, units = "days"))  cmc$list(packages = NULL) cmc$async_list(packages = NULL)  cmc$deps(packages, dependencies = NA, recursive = TRUE) cmc$async_deps(packages, dependencies = NA, recursive = TRUE)  cmc$revdeps(packages, dependencies = NA, recursive = TRUE) cmc$async_revdeps(packages, dependencies = NA, recursive = TRUE)  cmc$update() cmc$async_update() cmc$check_update() cmc$asnyc_check_update()  cmc$summary()  cmc$cleanup(force = FALSE)

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: primary_path: Path primary, user level cache. Defaults user level cache directory machine. replica_path: Path replica. Defaults temporary directory within session temporary directory. platforms: see default_platforms() possible values. r_version: R version create cache . bioc: Whether include BioConductor packages. cran_mirror: CRAN mirror use, takes precedence repos. repos: Repositories use. update_after: difftime object. Automatically update cache gets older . Set Inf avoid updates. Defaults seven days. packages: Packages query, character vector. dependencies: kind dependencies include. Works way dependencies argument utils::install.packages(). recursive: Whether include recursive dependencies. force: Whether force cleanup without asking user.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: cranlike_metadata_cache$new() creates new cache object. Creation trigger population cache. populated demand, queries executed . package, may want create cache instance .onLoad() function package, store package namespace. cheap operation, package still load fast, package code can refer common cache object. cmc$list() lists (specified) packages cache. returns data frame, see list columns . cmc$async_list() similar, asynchronous, returns deferred object. cmc$deps() returns data frame, (potentially recursive) dependencies packages. cmc$async_deps() , asynchronous, returns deferred object. cmc$revdeps() returns data frame, (potentially recursive) reverse dependencies packages. cmc$async_revdeps() , asynchronously, returns deferred object. cmc$update() updates metadata (needed) cache, returns data frame packages, invisibly. cmc$async_update() similar, asynchronous. cmc$check_update() checks metadata current, , updates . cmc$async_check_update() similar, asynchronous. cmc$summary() lists metadata cache, including location size. cmc$cleanup() deletes cache files disk, also memory.

title: Metadata cache for a CRAN-like repository — cranlike_metadata_cache
text: metadata data frame contains available versions (.e. sources binaries) packages. usually following columns, might missing platforms. package: Package name. title: Package title. version: Package version. depends: Depends field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. suggests: Suggests field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. built:  Built field DESCIPTION, binary package, NA_character_. imports: Imports field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. archs: Archs entries PACKAGES files. Might missing. repodir: directory file, inside repository. platform: character vector. See default_platforms() platform names. practice value platform column either "source" source packages, platform string, e.g. x86_64-apple-darwin17.0 macOS packages compatible macOS High Sierra newer. needscompilation: Whether package needs compilation. type: bioc cran  currently. target: path package file inside repository. mirror: URL CRAN/BioC mirror. sources: List column URLs one possible locations package file. source CRAN packages, contains URLs Archive directory well, case package archived since metadata cached. filesize: Size file, known, bytes, NA_integer_. sha256: SHA256 hash file, known, NA_character_. deps: package dependencies, data frame. license: Package license, might NA binary packages. linkingto: LinkingTo field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. enhances: Enhances field DESCRIPTION, NA_character_. os_type: unix windows OS specific packages. Usually NA. priority: "optional", "recommended" NA. (Base packages normally included list, "base" appear .) md5sum: MD5 sum, available, may NA. sysreqs: CRAN packages, SystemRequirements field, required system libraries software package. non-CRAN packages NA. published: time package published , GMT, POSIXct class. data frame contains extra columns well, internal use .

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
text: R platforms

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
code: current_r_platform()  current_r_platform_data()  default_platforms()

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
text: current_r_platform() returns character scalar. current_r_platform_data() returns data frame character scalar columns: cpu, vendor, os, distribution (Linux), release (Linux), platform: concatenation columns, separated dash. default_platforms() returns character vector default platforms.

title: R platforms — current_r_platform
text: current_r_platform() detects platform current R version. current_r_platform_data() similar, returns raw data instead character scalar. default pkgcache works source packages binary packages current platform. can change , providing different platform names arguments cranlike_metadata_cache$new(), repo_status(), etc. functions accept following platform names: "source" source packages, "macos" macOS binaries appropriate R versions pkgcache working . Packages incompatible CPU architectures dropped (defaulting CPU current macOS machine x86_64 non-macOS systems). macOS Darwin version selected based CRAN macOS binaries. E.g. R 3.5.0 macOS binaries built macOS El Capitan. "windows" Windows binaries default CRAN architecture. currently Windows Vista supported R versions, might change future. actual binary packages repository might support 32 bit 64 builds, one . practice 32-bit packages rare. CRAN builds including R 4.1 architectures, R 4.2 64 bit . "windows" alias i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32 currently. platform string like R.version$platform, Linux name version distribution also included. Examples: x86_64-apple-darwin17.0: macOS High Sierra. aarch64-apple-darwin20: macOS Big Sur arm64. x86_64-w64-mingw32: 64 bit Windows. i386-w64-mingw32: 32 bit Windows. i386+x86_64-w64-mingw32: 64 bit + 32 bit Windows. i386-pc-solaris2.10: 32 bit Solaris. (broken 64 Solaris builds might platform string, unfortunately.) x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-debian-10: Debian Linux 10 x86_64. x86_64-pc-linux-musl-alpine-3.14.1: Alpine Linux. x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-unknown: Unknown Linux Distribution x86_64. s390x-ibm-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04: Ubuntu Linux 20.04 S390x. amd64-portbld-freebsd12.1: FreeBSD 12.1 x86_64. default_platfoms() returns default platforms current R session. typically consist detected platform current R session, "source", source packages.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: R6 class implements concurrency safe package cache.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: default fields included every package: fullpath Full package path. path Package path, within repository. package Package name. url URL downloaded . etag ETag last download, given URL. sha256 SHA256 hash file. Additional fields can added needed. simple API session-wide instance class, see pkg_cache_summary() functions listed .

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
code: pc <- package_cache$new(path = NULL)  pc$list() pc$find(..., .list = NULL) pc$copy_to(..., .list = NULL) pc$add(file, path, sha256 = shasum256(file), ..., .list = NULL) pc$add_url(url, path, ..., .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL,   http_headers = NULL) pc$async_add_url(url, path, ..., .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL,   http_headers = NULL) pc$copy_or_add(target, urls, path, sha256 = NULL, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$async_copy_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., sha256 = NULL, ...,                .list = NULL, on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$update_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$async_update_or_add(target, urls, path, ..., .list = NULL,                on_progress = NULL, http_headers = NULL) pc$delete(..., .list = NULL)

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: path: package_cache$new() location cache. functions location file inside cache. ...: Extra attributes search . named. .list: Extra attributes search , named list. file:  Path file add. url: URL attribute. used update file, requested. sha256: SHA256 hash file. on_progress: Callback create progress bar. Passed internal function http_get(). target: Path copy (first) hit . urls: Character vector URLs try download file . http_headers: HTTP headers add HTTP queries.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
text: package_cache$new() attaches cache path. (default platform dependent user level cache directory.) cache exists, creates . pc$list() lists files cache, returns data frame default columns, potentially extra columns well. pc$find() list files match specified criteria (fullpath, path, package, etc.). Custom columns can searched well. pc$copy_to() copy first matching file cache target. returns data frame matching records, invisibly. file matches, returns empty (zero-row) data frame. pc$add() adds file cache. pc$add_url() downloads file adds cache. pc$async_add_url() , asynchronous. pc$copy_or_add() works like pc$copy_to(), file cache, tries download one specified URLs first. pc$async_copy_or_add() , asynchronous. pc$update_or_add() like pc$copy_to_add(), file cache tries update urls, using stored ETag avoid unnecessary downloads. pc$async_update_or_add() , asynchronous. pc$delete() deletes file(s) cache.

title: A simple package cache — package_cache
code: ## Although package_cache usually stores packages, it may store ## arbitrary files, that can be search by metadata pc <- package_cache$new(path = tempfile()) pc$list() #> [1] fullpath path     package  url      etag     sha256   #> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)  cat("foo\n", file = f1 <- tempfile()) cat("bar\n", file = f2 <- tempfile()) pc$add(f1, "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c pc$add(f2, "/f2") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 2 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f2  /f2      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 2 7d865e959b2466918c9863afca942d0fb89d7c9ac0c99bafc3749504ded97730 pc$list() #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #> 2 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f2  /f2      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c #> 2 7d865e959b2466918c9863afca942d0fb89d7c9ac0c99bafc3749504ded97730 pc$find(path = "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c pc$copy_to(target = f3 <- tempfile(), path = "/f1") #>                               fullpath path package url etag #> 1 /tmp/RtmpDvlj5M/file2df554eebad2//f1  /f1      NA  NA   NA #>                                                             sha256 #> 1 b5bb9d8014a0f9b1d61e21e796d78dccdf1352f23cd32812f4850b878ae4944c readLines(f3) #> [1] "foo"

what: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: function similar utils::installed.packages(). See differences .

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
code: parse_installed(   library = .libPaths(),   priority = NULL,   lowercase = FALSE,   reencode = TRUE )

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: library Character vector library paths. priority NULL may "base" "recommended" NA vector select base packages, recommended packages packages. (official, CRAN supported package priorities, may introduce others non-CRAN packages.) lowercase Whether convert keys DESCRIPTION lowercase. reencode Whether re-encode strings UTF-8, encodings specified DESCRIPTION files. Re-encoding somewhat costly, sometimes important (e.g. want extract dependencies installed packages).

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: Differences utils::installed.packages(): parse_installed() subset extracted fields. (can subset result.) parse_installed() cache results. parse_installed() handles errors better. See Section 'Errors' . #' * parse_installed() uses DESCRIPTION files installed packages instead Meta/package.rds files. matter, bug Meta/package.rds might contain wrong Archs field multi-arch platforms. parse_installed() reads fields DESCRIPTION files. utils::installed.packages() reads specified fields. parse_installed() converts output UTF-8 encoding, encodings declared DESCRIPTION files. parse_installed() considerably faster.

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: parse_installed() always returns result UTF-8 encoding. uses Encoding fields DESCRIPTION files learn encodings. parse_installed() check UTF-8 file valid encoding. fails convert string UTF-8 another declared encoding, leaves "bytes" encoded, without warning.

title: List metadata of installed packages — parse_installed
text: pkgcache silently ignores files directories inside library directory. result also omits broken package installations. include packages invalid DESCRIPTION files, packages current user access . errors reported via condition class pkgcache_broken_install. condition errors entry, data frame columns file: path DESCRIPTION file broken package, error: error message particular failure. intend handle broken package installation, need catch condition withCallingHandlers().

code: if (FALSE) { pkg_cache_summary() pkg_cache_list() pkg_cache_find(package = "forecast") tmp <- tempfile() pkg_cache_get_file(target = tmp, package = "forecast", version = "8.10") pkg_cache_delete_files(package = "forecast") }

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: metadata cache package cache support Bioconductor default, automatically. See BioC_mirror option R_BIOC_MIRROR R_BIOC_VERSION environment variables configure Bioconductor support.

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: BioC_mirror option can used select Bioconductor mirror. takes priority R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable. pkgcache_timeout HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_low_speed_limit pkgcache_low_speed_time used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less pkgcache_low_speed_limit bytes per second least pkgcache_low_speed_time seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options.

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: R_BIOC_VERSION environment variable can used override default Bioconductor version detection force given version. E.g. can used force development version Bioconductor. R_BIOC_MIRROR environment variable can used select Bioconductor mirror. BioC_mirror option takes priority , set. PKGCACHE_TIMEOUT HTTP timeout downloads. seconds, limit downloading whole file. Defaults 3600, one hour. corresponds TIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_timeout option priority , set. PKGCACHE_CONNECTTIMEOUT HTTP timeout connection phase. seconds defaults 30 seconds. corresponds CONNECTTIMEOUT libcurl option. pkgcache_connecttimeout option takes precedence , set. PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME used sensible HTTP timeout. download speed less PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT bytes per second least PKGCACHE_LOW_SPEED_TIME seconds, download errors. correspond LOW_SPEED_LIMIT LOW_SPEED_TIME curl options. pkgcache_low_speed_time pkgcache_low_speed_limit options priority environment variables, set. R_PKG_CACHE_DIR used cache directory, set. (Otherwise rappdirs::user_cache_dir() used, see also meta_cache_summary() pkg_cache_summary()).

title: Cache for package data and metadata — pkgcache-package
text: use pkgcache CRAN package, please make sure don’t use pkgcache examples, set R_USER_CACHE_DIR environment variable temporary directory (e.g. via tempfile()) test cases. See tests/testthat/setup.R file pkgcache example. make sure pkgcache modify user’s files running R CMD check.

what: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: pkgcache uses repos option, see options(). also automatically uses current Bioconductor repositories, see bioc_version(). functions help query manipulate repos option.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
code: repo_get(   r_version = getRversion(),   bioc = TRUE,   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror() )  repo_resolve(spec)  repo_add(..., .list = NULL)  with_repo(repos, expr)

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: r_version R version(s) use Bioconductor repositories, bioc TRUE. bioc Whether add Bioconductor repositories, even configured repos option. cran_mirror CRAN mirror use, see default_cran_mirror(). spec single repository specification, possibly named character scalar. See details . ... Repository specifications. See details . .list List character vector repository specifications, see details . repos list character vector repository specifications. expr R expression evaluate.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: repo_get() returns data frame columns: name: repository name. Names informational . url: repository URL. type: repository type. also informational, currently can cran CRAN, bioc Bioconductor repository, cranlike: repositories. r_version: R version supposed used repository. set Bioconductor repositories. * others. also informational, used retrieving package metadata. bioc_version: Bioconductor version. set Bioconductor repositories, NA others. repo_resolve() returns named character vector, URL(s) repository. repo_add() returns data frame repo_get(), invisibly. with_repo() returns value expr.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: repo_get() queries repositories pkgcache uses. uses repos option (see options), also default Bioconductor repository. repo_resolve() resolves single repository specification repository URL. repo_add() adds new repository repos option. (remove repository, call option() directly, subset want keep.) with_repo() temporarily adds repositories repos, evaluates expr, resets configured repositories.

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get
text: format repository specification named unnamed character scalar. name missing, pkgcache adds name automatically. repository named CRAN main CRAN repository, otherwise names informational. Currently supported repository specifications: URL pointing root CRAN-like repository. Example:   RSPM@<date>, RSPM (RStudio Package Manager) snapshot, specified date. RSPM@<package>-<version> RSPM snapshot, day release <version> <package>. RSPM@R-<version> RSPM snapshot, day R <version> released. MRAN@<date>, MRAN (Microsoft R Application Network) snapshot, specified date. MRAN@<package>-<version> MRAN snapshot, day release <version> <package>. MRAN@R-<version> MRAN snapshot, day R <version> released. Notes: See RSPM https://packagemanager.rstudio.com/client/#/. See MRAN snapshots https://mran.microsoft.com/timemachine. dates (times) can specified ISO 8601 format. RSPM snapshot available date, next available date used. Dates first, last RSPM snapshot trigger error. Dates first, last MRAN snapshot trigger error. Unknown R package versions trigger error.
code: https://cloud.r-project.org

title: Query and set the list of CRAN-like repositories — repo_get

what: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: checks status configured supplied repositories, specified platforms R versions.

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
code: repo_status(   platforms = default_platforms(),   r_version = getRversion(),   bioc = TRUE,   cran_mirror = default_cran_mirror() )

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: platforms Platforms use, default default_platforms(). r_version R version(s) use, default current R version, via getRversion(). bioc Whether add Bioconductor repositories. already configured via options(repos), can set FALSE. See bioc_version() details pkgcache handles Bioconductor repositories. cran_mirror CRAN mirror use, see default_cran_mirror().

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: data frame row every repository, every queried platform R version. columns: name: name repository. comes names configured repositories options("repos"), added pkgcache. typically CRAN CRAN, current Bioconductor repositories BioCsoft, BioCann, BioCexp, BioCworkflows. url: base URL repository. bioc_version: Bioconductor version, NA non-Bioconductor repositories. platform: platform, see default_platforms() possible values. path: path packages within base URL, given platform R version. r_version: R version, one specified R versions. ok: Logical flag, whether repository contains metadata file given platform R version. ping: HTTP response time repository seconds. ok column FALSE, columns NA. error: error object HTTP query failed repository, platform R version.

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
text: returned data frame summary() method, shows information concise table. See examples .

title: Show the status of CRAN-like repositories — repo_status
code: repo_status() #> # A data frame: 6 × 10 #>   name       url   type  bioc_…¹ platf…² path  r_ver…³ ok      ping error  #>   <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr>   <lgl>  <dbl> <list> #> 1 RSPM       http… cran… NA      source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.286  <NULL> #> 2 CRAN       http… cran  NA      source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.0648 <NULL> #> 3 BioCsoft   http… bioc  3.16    source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.0820 <NULL> #> 4 BioCann    http… bioc  3.16    source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.0804 <NULL> #> 5 BioCexp    http… bioc  3.16    source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.0943 <NULL> #> 6 BioCworkf… http… bioc  3.16    source  src/… 4.2     TRUE  0.131  <NULL> #> # title: pkgcache 2.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-26 built sysreqs columns metadata case always character vectors now, logicals, used edges cases past. deps column metadata cache tibble , data frame tbl class, . cran_archive_*() functions now download metadata newer currently. cran_archive_cleanup() now ignore force argument. sources column metadata cache now correct URL packages CRAN archive (https://github.com/r-lib/pak/issues/425).

title: pkgcache 2.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-08 pkgcache error messages better now. pkgcache now compress metadata cache files, makes loading metadata cache faster.

title: pkgcache 2.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-18 user visible changes.

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-16

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: Starting version 2.0.0 pkgcache returns data frames instead tibbles. data frames tibbles similar, completely compatible. convert output pkgcache tibbles call as_tibble() function . pkgcache loads pillar package startup, available, uses improve printing pkgcache data frames.

title: pkgcache 2.0.0
text: parse_packages() now automatically determines type PACKAGES* file, instead relying file extensions. pkgcache can now call back PACKAGES file PACKAGES.gz available. (fixes regression pkgcache 1.3.0.) pkgcache now uses HTTP 1.1 Linux well, crashes HTTP/2. pkgcache now supports file:///, repositories, .e. repositories local file system.

title: pkgcache 1.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-29 pkgcache now works better M1 macs. current_r_platform() much better job now. particular, Linux includes name release distribution. new current_r_platform_data() function returns platform information data frame, instead single string. Metadata now accurate Windows packages typically multi-arch R 4.2.0 (current R-devel). pkgcache DCF metadata parser now, much faster, parses fields PACAKGES* DESCRIPTION files. New parse_installed() function get metadata installed packages library. uses new DCF parser, quite fast. meta_cache_list() related functions now correctly set rversion column source R packages "*". pkgcache now uses HTTP 1.1 macOS, work around possible slowdown issue libcurl HTTP/2. pkgcache now uses extra metadata (file sizes, system requirements, etc.) RStudio Package Manager (RSPM) repositories well, long named RSPM getOption("repos").

title: pkgcache 1.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-19 default location cache changed align standard tools::R_user_dir() cache location. clean old cache call pkgcache:::cleanup_old_cache_dir().

title: pkgcache 1.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-04-14 user visible changes.

title: pkgcache 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-01 New repo_add(), repo_get(), repo_resolve() with_repo() functions query manipulate repositories. meta_cache_*() functions now handle getOption("repos") changes correctly. Failed metadata downloads now trigger metadata updates (#52). New bioc_release_version(), bioc_devel_version(), bioc_repos() helper functions deal Bioconductor repositories. Metadata cache functions, e.g. meta_cache_deps() etc. now allow specifying dependency types lowercase (#54).

title: pkgcache 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2020-10-11 package_cache now fail web server send Etag header downloading packages. package_cache now much relaxed HTTP timeouts, handles downloading many packages (slowly) much better. package download progress bar can now suppressed setting pkg.show_progress option FALSE.

title: pkgcache 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2020-07-07 New repo_status() function query status response time CRAN-like repositories. New bioc_version() bioc_version_map() functions query Bioconductor repositories. pkgcache now fail repositories provide package types. New current_r_platform(), default_cran_mirror() default_platforms() functions. pkgcache now works R 4.0.x macOS binaries.

title: pkgcache 1.0.7
text: CRAN release: 2020-04-18 Metadata now cached RDS version 2 formats, metadata written newer R version can used older R versions well (#36).

title: pkgcache 1.0.6
text: CRAN release: 2020-01-30 HTTP timeouts now much better, default defined terms download speed, instead total download time (#29). pkgcache now tries download metadata PACKAGES file, find PACKAGES.gz (@timmsm, #27). pkgcache now less verbose updating loading metadata.

title: pkgcache 1.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2019-05-31 Fix bug download functions, broke pak downloads.

title: pkgcache 1.0.4
text: CRAN release: 2019-05-13 Fix handling Bioconductor versions repositories, see README details. Now different versions pkgcache, potentially different metadata format, can share metadata cache directory.

title: pkgcache 1.0.3
text: CRAN release: 2019-01-11 Fix concurrency issues async API used multiple times event loop. Make package compatible tibble >= 2.0.0. Add meta_cache_summary() summary() method cranlike_metadata_cache. Return information metadata cache instance.

title: pkgcache 1.0.2
text: CRAN release: 2018-12-31 First public release
